name: Beast Agenda 2030
description: Beast Agenda 2030 is a Stealth, Gadgets and Hacking focused RPG with optional permadeath that encourages you to use your brain to complete missions in procedurally generated city districts. Inspired by Shadowrun SNES, Shadowrun Genesis, Metal Gear and Deus Ex.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb Storage: 1 GB available space
